articles.title: Israel starts human trials on COVID-19 vaccine as schools slowly reopen - Reuters
articles.description: Israel began human trials on Sunday for its COVID-19 vaccine candidate which, if successful, could be ready for the general public by the end of next summer.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
